summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3890 for the improvement of 16th Avenue Northeast, from East 63rd Street to East 70th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 47452, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
